messages.messageBody:
huh?????? I wonder, is it too early for your dch to be thinking about
*CHRISTMAS*??? haha ... mine are always on their *best* behavior from Th-g
holidays onnnnnn <g> ... ds's (11) birthday is on Christmas, so, it's a
double~whammie for him, lol ...

Pris (dss 11/9)

have learned how to type ...
